name: Better Modlog
short: A cog that puts the listcases command's response from the builtin modlog cog into an embed
description: This cog enhances the functionality of the builtin modlog cog by formatting the output of the `listcases` command into an embed, making it easier to read and understand.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data persistently.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing Better Modlog!
Please report any bugs/log output in *#support_other-cogs* on the cog support server (https://discord.gg/GET4DVk).
author: crayyy_zee

required_cogs.ModLog: The builtin ModLog cog is required for this cog to function properly.
